title: Small kid got slapped and kicked
selftext:
[https://twitter.com/SachinGuptaUP/status/1722476795868459068](https://twitter.com/SachinGuptaUP/status/1722476795868459068)

Some people are such aholes, how do these people think its okay do such things to a kid.

If they'd issues, they could've politely ask the kid to leave the shop.
comments:
To the guys who were too engrossed enjoyingin your food whilst a child was almost beaten to death a few feet from you, there are many more like you amongst us. 

We are the new India. 

No /s.
Its not new India, people like this always existed in India. Also such people exist in every other country/society.
